section.p: To renounce the worship of Tyrnai, you must suffer the Ceremony of the Wrathful Blow. A priest will strike you once - it is better to be struck by a priest than by Tyrnai himself!

if.if:
If you are determined to renounce your initiate status, pay the 50 Shards and
delete Tyrnai from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet. The high priest smashes you across the jaw, saying, 'I'm doing you a favour - believe me!'
